link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 三处内存泄漏
  2. 修复 手动切换主题时不完整切换
  3. 修复 在成功导入备份后不触发重启
  4. 改进 稍微加快加载速度
  5. 改进 为“扫描媒体”操作添加提示与选项
  6. 修改 禁止从 v1.8.2 之前的版本升级, 警告从 v1.9.3 之前的版本升级
  7. 翻译 更新德语 (jande75)
  8. 开发 使用 SDK 36 构建, 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: three memory leaks
  2. Fix: incomplete color updates after a manual theme switch
  3. Fix: missing reboot after a successful backup import (since v1.11.2)
  4. Improve: slightly accelerate loading speed
  5. Improve: add hint and options for Scan Media action
  6. Modify: forbid upgrading from prior to v1.8.2 & warn upgrading from prior to v1.9.3
  7. Translation: update German (by jande75)
  8. Development: build with SDK 36, update dependencies

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 手动切换主题时切换不完整
  2. 改进 稍微加快加载速度
  3. 改进 为“扫描媒体”操作添加提示与选项
  4. 修改 禁止从 v1.8.2 之前的版本升级, 警告从 v1.9.3 之前的版本升级
  5. 开发 使用 SDK 36 构建, 更新依赖
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: incompleted switching when manually switching theme
  2. Improve: slightly accelerate loading speed
  3. Improve: add hint and options for Scan Media action
  4. Modify: forbid upgrading from prior to v1.8.2 & warn upgrading from prior to v1.9.3
  5. Development: build with SDK 36, update dependencies
